about_the_game:
"Lunar maiden, River-side Angel, and the Godlike moment"

An 18+ novel game set in modern Japan. The troubles of a sick and lonely woman,

It is recommended for those who want to take a peek at the divinity born after falling in love with a young man who understands for the first time in their lives.

"I will make you real"

Away from her sick father and her mother, who committed suicide to care for him,

A woman who lives alone on the outskirts of the city, relying on relatives and welfare assistance ---- Hidari Takanagi.

She aspires to be both an actor and a screenwriter, but because she wants a self-satisfied stage, no one finds her.

I was spending my days talking to another self in my brain.

Meanwhile, it was a series of bizarre murders that shook the world.

It mainly targeted elderly people and women living alone, and was thought to be the same criminal because of their cruel way of doing things.

News sites and SNS were busy with the topic every day.

One day, Hidari finds a young man sitting in a corner of the park on his way home from a convenience store late at night.

Despite his otherworldly beauty and friendliness, he quickly fell in love with Hidari, and Hidari also opened his heart to him.

The two become friends.

――The beautiful man never said a word to Hidari, but he was a serial killer.

In this work, there are expressions of violence in the text,

Visual representation of bloodshed, sexual intercourse between men and women,

Includes expressions such as the suicide of a relative of a character.

Hidari Takanagi ─ Left (CV: 今谷皆美)

A 20-year-old woman.

Because her sick dad attempted to suicide alongside her,

she now lives alone in a project with the help of relatives and a welfare institute.

She is a person who feels uncomfortable if she doesn't speak out immediately what she thinks.

She often thinks about various issues but lacks cooperation with others.

To things that she thinks cannot be compromised, she will never give in.

She is not a virgin. She also used to look for men everywhere on dating apps.

Essentially, she is a boring woman.

After others have a relationship with her, they will dump her.

From then until now, she has been a lonely and persecuted person.

She relies heavily on the first and only person who understands her, Migi.

Migi ─ Right (CV: 胸板鉄板ミート)

A handsome man who met Left in the park at night.

He said that he accidentally got lost while strolling.

After hearing Hidari's name, he gave the name Migi, which was obviously a pseudonym.

He didn't want to tell Hidari anything about himself.

He gives the impression that he is the kind of man who is very used to getting along with women.

Migi indeed has feelings for Hidari.

Even for Left's delusions of persecution and suspicion that are beyond the level of ordinary people,

he can also show understanding.

His favorite things are salmon onigiri and soda from convenience stores.

According to Migi himself, he also lost his parents for the same reason.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sexual acts between adult men and women, some visual representations of blood, textual violence, and suicidal representations of characters' relatives.

detailed_description:
💕ONANIましょう👉👌


About the Game

"Lunar maiden, River-side Angel, and the Godlike moment"

An 18+ novel game set in modern Japan. The troubles of a sick and lonely woman,

It is recommended for those who want to take a peek at the divinity born after falling in love with a young man who understands for the first time in their lives.
